mapper.select: select RegionCode,regioncode, prv, cty, twn, stage from region where left(RegionCode,2)=(select left(RegionCode,2) from region where Prv=#{prv});
select RegionCode,regioncode, prv, cty, twn, stage from region where left(RegionCode,4)=(select left(RegionCode,4) from region where cty=#{cty});
select RegionCode as regionCode, Prv as prv,Cty as cty ,Twn as twm from region where RegionCode=#{id};
